stanzas: Give ear to my words O Lord, consider my meditation. Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O Lord, in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
Give ear to my words O Lord, consider my meditation. Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O Lord, in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
I look up to you Lord. I will look up.
